VII. THE TIME-ASYMPTOTIC STATE OF THE YARD-SALE MODEL It is well known that the equilibrium solution of the molecular Boltzmann equation, namely the Maxwell-Boltzmann distribution, may be found by setting the variation of Boltzmann's H function to zero, under the constraints of fixed mass, momentum and energy.

\section{The time-asymptotic state of the Yard-Sale Model} It is well known that the equilibrium solution of the molecular Boltzmann equation, namely the Maxwell-Boltzmann distribution, may be found by setting the variation of Boltzmann's $H$ function to zero, under the constraints of fixed mass, momentum and energy.
